name: ToothbrushTimer
0:
”Alexa, ask Toothbrush Timer to begin brushing”
”Alexa, ask Toothbrush Timer to start”
”Alexa, open Toothbrush Timer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: toothbrush timer
des:
Toothbrush timer is a simple Alexa skill that helps you brush for the recommended 2 full minutes. It prompts you to switch to different parts of your mouth every 30 seconds and provides some encouragement along the way. Use it twice a day, every day!

To start, just say "Alexa, ask Toothbrush Timer to start" or "Alexa, open Toothbrush Timer".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
